formula: a(n):=sum(k=0..n/2, binomial(n,2*k)*(2*k)^(n-2*k)*(-1)^k), n>0, a(0)=1. [From Vladimir Kruchinin, Jun 29 2011]
prog: (Maxima)a(n):=if n=0 then 1 else sum(binomial(n,2*k)*(2*k)^(n-2*k)*(-1)^k,k,0,n/2); [From Vladimir Kruchinin, Jun 29 2011]
author: _R. H. Hardin_
